title: Project Manager (Japanese speaker)
content:
Did you know that about 10% of all insurance payouts are flowing directly into the pockets of fraudsters? The future of insurance starts with Decisions Made Better.
Shift Technology harnesses the power of AI to enable the world’s leading insurance organizations to make better decisions.  Our products automate and optimize decisions from underwriting to claims, resulting in increased operational efficiency, reduced costs, and superior customer experiences for millions of people around the globe.
Our culture is built on innovation, trust, and a drive to transform the insurance industry by imagining and innovating solutions that impact insurers and their customers - like you! We come from more than 50 different countries and cultures and together we are creating the future of insurance.At Shift Technology, we’re transforming insurance with AI. We help insurers fully automate more claims, deliver a great customer experience while protecting against risk and accurately identifying suspected fraud, making internal teams more effective and improving financial performance.
Shift Technologyは、AIで保険業務の変革に挑戦しています。私たちは、保険会社の請求処理の自動化、疑いのある請求の検知を行い業務効率、財務実績および顧客体験の向上のサポートをしております。
Since our launch in 2014 in Paris, we've raised over $320M with Tier 1 investors, opened offices in Boston, Tokyo, Singapore, London, Madrid, Mexico, Hong-Kong, and Sao Paulo, and currently work with more than 100 of the world’s leading insurers. If you are excited about joining a fast-growing insurtech innovator with a passion for excellence and global culture, Shift is the place for you.
 
2014年にパリで設立以来、ボストン、東京、シンガポール、ロンドン、マドリード、メキシコ、香港、サンパウロにオフィスを開設し、また3億2,000万ドル以上を投資家より調達致しました。
現在、世界を牽引する100社以上の保険会社が弊社サービスを利用しております。
急成長しているインシュアテック（保険 x テクノロジー）業界で、グローバルな文化を楽しみ、かつ最高の技術・品質への追及に興奮（ワクワク）を覚えるならばShift Technologyは、ふさわしい場所です。
 
ROLE INTRODUCTION
As part of the project management team, you will be the cornerstone of client relationships. As a project manager, you will anticipate risk, communicate with both external and internal parties, develop and manage implementation plans, guide roadmap execution, and assist with identifying client needs.  
役割
プロジェクトマネジメントチームの一員として、顧客との信頼関係を構築する中心的な役割を担います。プロジェクトマネージャーは、リスクの把握と管理、社内の複数部署および顧客とコミュニケーションを取り、要件の調整、実装計画の作成および管理、また、顧客のニーズの特定、ロードマップ作成の支援を行います。
What you'll do:

Work closely with our growing team to help increase our footprint in the Japan market.
Manage overall delivery of the solution by linking Shift Technology’s and clients’ technical teams;
Ensure client satisfaction during the entire lifecycle of the product;
Participate in stages of project selling (answer tenders / RFP, define project methodology and organization, validate client requirements, develop SOW, etc.)
Define profitability methods (pricing, commercial offers and business cases)
Play a role in shaping the internal workings of the company by executing on strategic internal projects to help us become more effective as a company.

業務内容

社内の複数部署と緊密に連携して日本市場でのビジネスの拡大
社内エンジニア部門と顧客のIT部門およびビジネス部門間をとりまとめながら弊社サービスの構築の管理
サービスのライフサイクル全体を通して顧客満足の維持確保
提案段階からの参画（RFPの回答、開発手法やチーム手配調整、顧客要件の検証、SOW作成等）
収益性（価格設定、コマーシャルオファー、ビジネスケース）の定義
会社の成長に合わせた戦略的な社内プロセスの策定、改善やその実施

 
What you bring:

You have excellent communication skills, both oral and written; you know how to make complex things feel simple;
You already have experience (at least 5 years) in project management for IT and/or insurance companies;
Being certified in PM certifications such as CAPM, PMP or Prince2 is a plus. 
You are dynamic, curious and eager to learn, always looking to expand your fields of expertise;
You show leadership by being proactive and taking ownership of your work; you often come up with new ideas to improve our service quality, and know how to get your teammates behind them;
You are comfortable managing multiple projects and simultaneously dealing with the pressure of delivering an excellent service to our customers;
You are a native Japanese speaker and you can communicate clearly in English.

 
求める人材

対面、文章共に素晴らしいコミュニケーションスキルを有する方。複雑な事象を簡潔に説明する方法をよく知っている方
5年以上のIT業界もしくは保険業界でプロジェクトマネジメントの経験のある方
CAPM、PMPあるいはPrince2の資格者はプラス
積極的に関心を持ち、学ぶ事に熱心であり、専門領域を拡げる事を常に考えている方。
オーナーシップをもって積極的にリーダーシップを発揮される方。サービスの品質を改善する為の新しい試みを思いつき、チームメンバーに働きかけ、リードできる方
複数のプロジェクトを同時に管理する事に躊躇いが無く、顧客に対し高品質のサービスを提供するためのプレッシャーに対処できる方
日本語はネイティブであり、また英語で明確に意思疎通ができる方

Interview process

Talent Acquisition interview
Hiring Manager interview
Case review
Final interview with Head of Delivery

 
To support our employees at every stage of their careers and lives, we provide a competitive total rewards and benefits package. Here are the global benefits we’d like to highlight:

Flexible remote and hybrid working options
Competitive Salary and a variable component tied to personal and company performance
Company equity
Focus Fridays, a half-day each month to focus on learning and personal growth
Generous PTO and paid holidays
Mental health benefits 
2 MAD Days per year (Make A Difference Days for paid volunteering)

Additional benefits may be offered by country - ask your recruiter for more information.
At Shift we strive to be a diverse and inclusive workforce. We hire and trust people without regard to race, color, religion, marital status, age, national or ethnic origin, physical or mental disability, medical condition, pregnancy, genetic information, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, or other non-merit criteria.
Shift Technology is committed to providing reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities in our application and employment process. Should you require accommodation, please email accommodation@shift-technology.com and we will work with you to meet your accessibility needs.
Shift Technology does not accept unsolicited CVs from recruiters or employment agencies in response to the Shift Technology Careers page or a Shift Technology social media post. Any unsolicited CVs, including those submitted directly to hiring managers, are deemed to be the property of Shift Technology.
